aboutMyCurrentRole.description: I have a Computer Science Degree and MBA. I am a web developer and I love conceiving and building new products and technology at the intersection of Media and Technology.

workDetails.title: Wipro
workDetails.description: Started as a Senior Front End Developer responsible for optimizing the Wipro main site and moved to backend where I worked with databased as large as 100K records.

workDetails.title: Forbes
workDetails.description: Technology contributor to Forbes focusing on the intersection of Silicon Valley and Business with an emphasis of where computer science meets social science.

workDetails.title: Visma
workDetails.description: Junior web developer at Visma in Ireland, where I worked in the team responsible for developing responsive websites and mobile applications.

Volunteer as Mentor.description: I love helping people advance in my area of knowlege and I strongly believe that by helping another person one gets to understand better the things he explains and I always find pleasure in seeing other progressing.
Volunteer as Mentor.keyStrengths: Patience, good english skills,offer materials to help mentees, close supervision

list.name: Nikita Stone
list.description: Jessica was a great mentee. She took detailed notes and our communication went very smooth. I'll gave her a 6 starts if I could!

list.name: Tom Hanks
list.description: She has strong business development and deep technological know-how. Although she had no idea of PERL, she was quickly to make associations to other languages.

list.name: Jessie Smith
list.description: I met Jessica in Melbourne, Australia 2 years ago and I have a great deal of respect for his personal passion. It was great being able to have him as my mentee.

newMeetingRequestData.messageText:
Hi Jessica, I am going in a trip next Friday. Let's have the meeting ASAP. What time works best for you?
Looking forward,
Nancy
